channel.title: Patch bank editor uploading error
channel.description:
Hi! Running on Win10. When uploading patches with Patch Bank Editor - it seems like it uploads mix of proper patches with copies but with proper names. Just for example: - create 7 simple patches with different osc and switching subpatch inside - add them to Bank Editor - press Upload The Bank
When switching between patches, console shows running#0..running#1 etc but sound changes only with #0, #3,#4, #6 After Upload each patch manually from menu - everything works fine.

item.title: Patch bank editor uploading error
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

The patch bank functionality hasn't been fully implemented yet in 1.0.11, this will probably be fixed in the next release of the patcher software.

Read full topic

item.title: Patch bank editor uploading error
item.dc:creator: @404zero Alex
item.description:
@404zero wrote:

Hi!
Running on Win10.
When uploading patches with Patch Bank Editor - it seems like it uploads mix of proper patches with copies but with proper names.
Just for example:
- create 7 simple patches with different osc and switching subpatch inside
- add them to Bank Editor
- press Upload The Bank

When switching between patches, console shows running#0..running#1 etc but sound changes only with #0, #3,#4, #6
After Upload each patch manually from menu - everything works fine.

Read full topic
